home.parrafo-info: Web developer passionate about creating innovative and attractive digital solutions. I have two years of experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP in projects for clients from various industries.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
Web developer passionate about creating innovative and attractive digital solutions. I have two years of experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP on projects for clients from various industries. I like to keep up with the latest trends and technologies in the field of web development and constantly learn new skills. My goal is to continue growing as a professional and add value to the companies that trust in my work.

In addition, I am good at working in work teams and I easily adapt to different environments and situations.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A game where the user must guess the secret word with a certain number of chances. The word is chosen randomly by the program and the user will lose the moment the gallows is completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can type a text and the encryptor encrypts it with pre-programmed keys. The encryptor can also decrypt the text.
